TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryExceptionDictionary extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase
Public NotInheritable Class DiscoveryExceptionDictionary Inherits DictionaryBase
public ref class DiscoveryExceptionDictionary sealed : System::Collections::DictionaryBase

Docs.summary: Collects exceptions that occurred during XML Web services discovery. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Errors%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol> is of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryExceptionDictionary>.
